MSG_NO_PATTERN: ̃This message sequence does not exist. There's been a bug.
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_000:
̃ȁ, you came.... I knew you'd be back here.
ā
As long as those Incarnii keep the phantom door open, I will keep my promise.
ā
But you know, it's only so natural for demons to fight. The Djinn is no exception.
ā
I am bored out of my mind. And this is all because of you and the Incarnii.
ā
So ȁ. Entertain me. Let's battle.
ā
You can only battle with your current team, no standby, and your money wil not reduce by half if you lose.
ā
And if you win, I'll give you a little something. So? Doesn't that sound fun? Ă
MSG_MAOU_CHANGE_DEMO_011:
̃I sought for power for many years and finally reached my pinacle.
ā
I believe others who used the same method have reffered to it as the Secret of evolution. 
ā
Now then, ȁ. Once I unleash this power, there is no backing down.
ā
A R E  Y O U  P R E P A R E D ?
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_010:
̃ȁ, you came. I knew you'd be back here.
ā
What? You don't understand why I look fine even after losing to a human?
ā
Hah. No one can beome the Djinn without knowing how it feels to lose.
ā
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_020:
̃ȁ, you came. I already knew you were coming.
ā
Not sure if it's human instinct or that it's just you but you're just like me. you like battles.
ā
Haha, you can't deny it? Of course. That's why you can't stay away from this place.
ā
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_030:
̃You're here, ȁ. I was waiting for you.
ā
Battles with you are the only thing I have to look forward to.
ā
The only ones who can tangle with me are you and the Incarnii.
ā
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_040:
̃You're here, ȁ. I've been waiting for you.
ā
You're a weird being. You defeated me so many times but you never boast about it.
ā
I see..... No wonder those Incarnii are so fond of you.
ā
You know, I'm in such a good mood today that I'll make the reward a special one.
ā
Okay, are you ready for this? Ă
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_COMMON_010:
̃Alright, let's start. If you win, I'll give you a reward.
ā
You ready?Ă
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_LOSE_010:
̃ȁ, I'm glad you're back. I knew you would return.
ā
I know that you're not a quitter just because you lost.
ā
And you're back, which means that you're stronger than before right?
ā
I'm couning on you ȁ. Are you ready?
Ă
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_NO_010:
̃ȁ, I'm so glad you came back. I knew you'd come back.
ā
Alright, are you ready? Ă
MSG_BATTLE_LOSE_010_EVO:
̃I've been keeping tabs. Out of %ls battles, you won %ls and lost %ls times.
ā
Hahaha. I guess I was stronger this time. I'm telling you, I am also getting stronger each time.
ā
But losing once or twice is nothing. Pursuit of strength is a long journey and takes patience.
ā
You're not stopping now, right? I'll wait as long as I need to.
ā
We have all the time in the world.
MSG_BATTLE_YES_FIRST_010:
̃Hahahaha that's it! That's what I've been waiting for! But I'm not going to make it easy for you either.
ā
I never go easy, so you better fight with all your strength!
MSG_BATTLE_YES_COMMON_010:
̃Just like you, I am also getting stronger too.
ā
I never go easy, so you better fight with all your strength!
MSG_BATTLE_NO_010:
̃What's wrong? Are you intimidated by me? Or are you just not ready yet?
ā
I'll wait for you but don't make me wait too long.
MSG_BATTLE_WIN_010:
̃Arrrgh.... You won again! You're getting stronger and stronger every time, just like I am....
ā
Hahaha ȁ! I really enjoyed this battle.
ā
You saved me from boredom. I applaud you. Here, take what is yours.
MSG_BATTLE_WIN_020:
̃Hahaha ȁ! Good. I'm actually okay losing to you.
ā
Here, take this. I'll be looking forward to battle again tomorrow.
MSG_BATTLE_WIN_030:
̃Hahaha,　ȁ. Looks like you're loving this just as much as I do.
ā
Here's your reward. I'm curious to see how many times you can beat me.
MSG_BATTLE_WIN_040:
̃Hahaha　ȁ! Your power surpasses my own.
ā
I enjoyed our battle again. Here, take your reward.
MSG_BATTLE_WIN_070_EVO:
̃I've been keeping tabs. Out of %ls battles, you won %ls and lost %ls times.
ā
ȁ, does your pursuit of power have no bounds?
ā
If you want to test out your power, come again tomorrow. I'll gladly battle you.
ā
But don't forget. I am also boundless, just like you...
MSG_BATTLE_WIN_050:
̃Hahah, I lost again... But I feel good about this.
ā
I guess I am growing a heart if I'm starting to feel this way. Here, come get your reward.
MSG_BATTLE_WIN_070:
̃I've been keeping tabs. Out of %ls battles, you won %ls and lost %ls times.
ā
ȁ, if you wish to battle again come back tomorrow.
ā
I'll surely be stronger tomorrow. I'll let you see a different side of me.
MSG_BATTLE_WIN_080:
̃That is my alter ego and I gave him some of my powers.
ā
You can travel together, or even create a new monster using it.
ā
You can do whatever you want with him, I'll leave it to you. But our battles aren't over yet.
ā
Battling you made me grow so much. I think I might be reaching an end to my journey.
ā
If you're willing to help me reach my goal, I'll give you the same reward every 5 times you win.
ā
Now, out of %ls battles, you won %ls and lost %ls times.
ā
ȁ, if you wish to battle with me again, come back tomorrow. 
ā
I'll surely be stronger tomorrow. I'll let you see a different side of me.
MSG_BATTLE_WIN_100_EVO:
̃You might sometimes need your alter ego to become stronger.
ā
Now, out of %ls battles, you won %ls and lost %ls times.
ā
ȁ, you're an endless seeker of strength.
ā
If you want to test out your power, come again tomorrow. I'll gladly battle you.
ā
But don't forget. I am also an endless seeker, just like you.....
MSG_BATTLE_LOSE_010:
̃Now, out of %ls battles, you won %ls and lost %ls times.
ā
But ȁ, what's wrong? I know you can do better than this.
ā
Or is it that I've become too strong for you? Come on, you gotta entertain me.
ā
ȁ. I'll give you some time. Come back stronger next time.
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_NO_010_EVO:
̃You came, ȁ. I knew you'd come back.
ā
If you win, I'll give you a reward. Are you ready? Ă

ȁ, if you wish to battle again come back tomorrow.

MSG_MAOU_CHANGE_DEMO_010:
̃I am the invincible lord of the Demon realm, Madullajah Marid. The inscrutable overlord. 
ā
MSG_BATTLE_BEFORE_060_EVO:
̃You came, ȁ. And endless seeker of strength.

ā
 Pursuit of strength is a long journey and takes patience. It's sometimes important to stop and think.

It's not a problem. I'll wait. We have all the time in the world.

̃Arrgh, I have to admit, you were awesome. You again.... exceeded my expectations. Hahaha
